item.description: æŒç»­æ›´æ–°ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ å“ˆå¸Œ 1. ä¸¤æ•°ä¹‹å’Œï¼ˆç®€å•ï¼‰ å“ˆå¸Œ def twoSum(self, nums: List[int], target: int) -> List[int]: tab = {} for i in range(len(nums)): if target-nums[i] in tab: return [i,tab[target-nums[i]]] tab[nums[i]]=i 2. å­—æ¯å¼‚ä½è¯åˆ†ç»„ï¼ˆä¸­ç­‰ï¼‰ æ’åº+å“ˆå¸Œ def groupAnagrams(self, strs: List[str]) -> List[List[str]]: tab = defaultdict(list) for s in strs: key = ''.join(sorted(s)) # listéœ€è¦è½¬æ¢ä¸ºå­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ‰èƒ½è¿›è¡Œå“ˆå¸Œ tab[key].append(s) return list(tab.values()) è®¡æ•°+å“ˆå¸Œ def groupAnagrams(self, strs: List[str]) -> List[List[str]]: mp = defaultdict(list) for st in strs: counts = [0] * 26 for ch in st: counts[ord(ch) - ord("a")] += 1 # éœ€è¦å°† list è½¬æ¢æˆ tuple æ‰èƒ½
